overview: Best friends Michael and Susan are college film students in search of the perfect senior film project. Bold, Shocking and never been done before is what they are hoping to achieve. What the duo soon discovers though is that sometimes it's all about taking risks. And with the film project that they have come up with, risky is an understatement. Now with their final project in hand, the duo must figure out how to convince their professor that their film project, which involves multiple sex scenes is 'doable'. Do Michael and Susan get to make sex on film a reality? You'll have to watch to find out.Sex On Film, sometimes it's all about taking risks.
tagline: Film school will never be the same.
title: Sex on Film
